location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Henderson, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication from the Resident, dated 23 May 1819, which reported that letters concerning the transportation of Joasmee [QawƒÅsim] prisoners of war from Bombay have been delivered to the Cheftain of Rasul Khyma [Ra's al-Khaymah].
